value:
$WmMPID_リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_M_Normal,Face|The River Thracia... So vast that no
matter how often I look at it, it always
captivates me...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The historical record holds that your
liberation army is victorious here and
crosses to the other side.$k$p$WmMPID_リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_M_Normal,Face|You understand how our future is
going to play out... $k$pIs that what you're saying?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Correct. But even as we speak, the
Tempest is bearing down on this land.
You must take up your sword.$k$pYou must face the same man you did
in the histories I read.$k$p$WmMPID_リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_M_Normal,Face|Sir Reinhardt... His reputation
precedes him.$k$pAll say he is an adept of the
battlefield... Some even say he is no
less than the crusader Thrud reborn.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The fight to quell the Tempest will
likely be much more difficult than
anything you have faced 'til now.$k$pLet us proceed with all due caution,
Prince Leif.$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The Tempest's chaos has once again
been quieted... Your efforts are
appreciated, Prince Leif.$k$pThe history I studied had the measure
of you. You are, indeed, a great Hero.$k$p$WmMPID_リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_M_Normal,Face|A Hero, you say?$k$pA wise man once told me that Heroes
do not choose to be Heroes—that the
era demands they become Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|That is a fair thing to say, I believe.$k$pThat is why I wear this mask... There
was need of a Hero.$k$p$WmMPID_リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_M_Normal,Face|Prince Marth?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The story of the battle you fought
fascinates me.$k$pThe scale of the enemy's forces was
vast... You were at an overwhelming
disadvantage.$k$pAfter so many fights, you and your
allies were beyond exhausted.$k$pYou stole supplies from the enemy,
rescued your comrades, and faced
up to those overwhelming odds.$k$p$WmMPID_リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_M_Normal,Face|So you say...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|My world faces circumstances
just as dire.$k$pThat victory was something you
reached out and grasped, relying
on your own strength...$k$pI hope you can understand, even
a little, why I admire you.$k$pAs I fought beside you, I felt that
feeling grow...$k$p$WmMPID_リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_M_Normal,Face|But I have so much to learn! Hearing
this is a little embarrassing...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|You're too modest, Prince. There is
no denying that you are a Hero. The
light in you shines strongly.$k$pI am honored to have met you.
Someday, sometime... Perhaps we
can meet again, Sage-Lord.$k$p
